availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Married Elizabeth Hogan. Father of Agnes R. Hogan, David H. Hogan, Edwin D. Hogan, and Lizzie Hogan. Carpenter in Carroll County in 1850. Clerk of the Carroll Circuit Court in Carrollton, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District No. 1, p. 190; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Carrollton District No. 2, p. 26; Find A Grave, "John Hogan (1813 - 1885)," Memorial #8208299, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=8208299 (accessed October 5, 2017).
